kinetic.client

Class ClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      • java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
        • java.util.Properties
          • kinetic.client.ClientConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminClientConfiguration

    public class ClientConfiguration
extends java.util.Properties
    Kinetic Client configuration.

    Kinetic applications construct a new instance of this instance and set appropriate configurations. Application then calls KineticClientFactory.createInstance(ClientConfiguration) to create a new instance of KineticClient

    Author:
    James Hughes., Chiaming Yang
    See Also:
    KineticClientFactory.createInstance(ClientConfiguration), KineticClient, Serialized Form

      • getConnectTimeoutMillis

        public int getConnectTimeoutMillis()

      • setRequestTimeoutMillis

        public void setRequestTimeoutMillis(long millis)
        Set request timeout (in milli seconds) for the client instance.

        The default request timeout is set to 30000 milli seconds if not set. The default value is used if the specified timeout is equal or less than 0.

        Setting a small request timeout could introduce unexpected side effects. Such as timed out before a response is received.

        Applications may set a large timeout value when desired, such as for long running request-response operations.

        Parameters:
        millis - request timeout (in milli seconds) for the current client instance
        See Also:
        setRequestTimeoutMillis(long)

      • getRequestTimeoutMillis

        public long getRequestTimeoutMillis()
        Get the request timeout (in milli seconds) used for the client instance.
        Returns:
        the request timeout (in milli seconds) used for the client instance.
        See Also:
        setRequestTimeoutMillis(long)

      • setAsyncQueueSize

        public void setAsyncQueueSize(int qsize)
        Set asynchronous operation queued size. For asynchronous operations, a request is blocked when the queued requests reached the count set for this instance. Default is set to 10.
        Parameters:
        qsize - the max queued operations to be set for the current kinetic client instance.

      • getAsyncQueueSize

        public int getAsyncQueueSize()
        Get asynchronous operation queued size. For asynchronous operations, a request is blocked when the queued requests reached the size set for this instance. Default is set to 10.
        Returns:
        the max queued operations for the current kinetic instance

      • getThreadPoolAwaitTimeout

        public long getThreadPoolAwaitTimeout()
        Get Java Nio thread pool exit await timeout - used when connection is closed and Java client runtime library waiting for thread pool to exit.
        Returns:
        time out in milli seconds.

      • setThreadPoolAwaitTimeOut

        Parameters:
